overview:
Prior to co-founding Decisionaire, Jeff served as Vice President of Marketing for Social Solutions - establishing the company as a recognized leader and respected authority on nonprofit performance management.

Before Social Solutions, Jeff co-founded Artifact Software and before that was a member of Sequoia Software’s (NASDAQ: SQSW) original executive management team where he served as Vice President of Corporate Communications and then as Vice President of Marketing. When Sequoia was acquired by Citrix, Jeff spent some time as a member of the Citrix management team where he established the Citrix Solutions Marketing Group.

Jeff’s past experience working with nonprofits sparked a passion for improving the impact of the nonprofit sector. As a result, Jeff founded and chairs the Alliance for Effective Social Investing (www.alleffective.org). He also serves on the boards of the Superstar Foundation (www.superstarfoundation.org) and PerformWell (www.performwell.org).
